alert.note: Alert for Blair; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Potter (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 5:28PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY SHOWERS WITH POSSIBLE THUNDER WILL IMPACT WESTERN CENTRE...SOUTHERN POTTER...NORTHERN BLAIR AND NORTHWESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EST... At 527 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers with possible thunder extending from 21 miles northeast of St. Marys to near Tyrone to Altoona. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Altoona, Tyrone, Wharton, Keating, Philipsburg, Bald Eagle, Lakemont, Bellwood, Williamsburg, Renovo, Galeton, Tipton, Snow Shoe, Clarence, South Renovo, South Philipsburg, Sandy Ridge, Moshannon, Pine Glen, and Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blair; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Potter
